section4.title: Marketing
section4.subDesc1: I authorize GenAi Space to send me emails about products, services and offers that may be of interest to me.
section4.subDesc2: I authorize GenAi Space to send me push notifications about products, services and offers that may be of interest to me.
section4.subDesc3: I authorize GenAi Space to share my data (name, email, and app events) with social and promotional platforms for advertising purposes and to conduct analytics.
